page.title: 11RELIGION
page.content:
WE SHARE OUR RECTOR WITH FOUR OTHER PARISHES. THERE ARE TWO CHURCHES, SAINT MARYS AT LITTLE FRANSHAM, WHICH IS NOW THE PARISH CHURCH, AND ALL SAINTS AT GREAT FRANSHAM WHICH IS NOW THE CHAPEL OF EASE.
THERE IS A PAROCHIAL CHURCH COUNCIL OF 14 WHO ARE LONG STANDING MEMBERS OF THE CHURCH AND WORK TO RAISE MONEY TO CARRY OUT REPAIRS TO BOTH CHURCHES. THEY HOLD AN ANNUAL LUNCH AND IN THE AUTUMN ARE HOLDING A FLOWER DEMONSTRATION IN SWAFFHAM.
THE CONGREGATION IS VERY SMALL EXCEPT AT HARVEST FESTIVAL AND CHRISTMAS WHEN THE CHURCH IS FULL.
